quest.king's_recruit.stage2.2: §7[2/3] §r§2Aledar: §r§aIt looks nice. The war clearly hasn't made it this far.§r
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.3: §7[3/3] §r§2Old Man: §r§aHey, you three! Come over here and talk to me.§r
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.10: §7[1/1] §r§2Tasim: §r§aHey, %1$s! Don't leave yet, let's talk to this old man. §r§b§lRight-click§r§a on him to talk.§r
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.10.regexp: ^§7\[1/1\] §r§2Tasim: §r§aHey, (\w+)! Don't leave yet, let's talk to this old man. §r§b§lRight-click§r§a on him to talk.§r$
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.11: §7[1/1] §r§2Tasim: §r§b§lRight-click§r§a on the old man to talk to him.§r
chat.e3a1bd3b9fa5b54dbbd6454909c4bb90417: §7[2/5] §r§2Old Man: §r§aI've been waiting for you three, you're late. There's a bit of trouble up ahead. You will need to get yourself some raw materials.§r
chat.65835391a797e675645db4e55467b3e8212: §7[3/5] §r§2Tasim: §r§aI didn't think we needed anything. Why would raw materials help us?§r
chat.685f418270baa92ad89a05779c85f2dac92: §7[4/5] §r§2Old Man: §r§aWell, you thought wrong. You will need some raw materials to make yourself something to fight with.§r
chat.5c0bc25dbfea5960c1474735c117a607d6e: §7[5/5] §r§2Old Man: §r§aI left my scythe by the crops over yonder. Punch it and pick it up. Then harvest §r§3[2 Wheat]§r§a and bring it back here.§r
chat.dc19468e5b1b5aecf57b86082db804a9fda: §7[1/1] §r§2Old Man: §r§aHarvest §r§3[2 Wheat]§r§a and then bring it to me.§r
chat.b1af73ecb84f0d6ff7e9452345eb7c9ea0c: §7[1/6] §r§2Old Man: §r§aThat looks like the stuff. I was sent ahead by the guards to warn any newcomers.§r
chat.94f302bcdee7c15d4deecc5fa9bc85dd14e: §7[2/6] §r§2Old Man: §r§aNormally, this place is pretty safe, but somehow a few corrupt slipped through.§r
chat.82fcb1a65c8eb6de4c6af55ead711f6107e: §7[3/6] §r§2Old Man: §r§aWe're pretty far from the §r§dPortal §r§aso I don't know how they got here. They even broke the bridge!§r
chat.b75b14f9def7a46ec6472d987134093c521: §7[4/6] §r§2Old Man: §r§aThe guards told me to send you on ahead with that wheat so you can get yourself kitted out.§r
chat.241f0b356f99b4cf6078d90092653378658: §7[5/6] §r§2Old Man: §r§aThere's a refinery up ahead. You three can §r§a§lforge weapons§r§a there.§r
chat.97afb281479e5720becc64594c79e795191: §7[6/6] §r§2Aledar: §r§aThanks for the warning. I guess we better get going then. %s, lead the way.§r
^§7\[6/6\] §r§2Aledar: §r§aThanks for the warning\. I guess we better get going then\. (\w+), lead the way\.§r$
chat.b34a19ca0ae3a58f03223bfaa0e6e6318d9: §7[1/1] §r§2Tasim: §r§aHey, don't leave yet! We still need to check out the bridge!§r
chat.3924e6faf2273037e1e5ddd5d40e2aa5142: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§aThe old man said something about a bridge being broken. Let's check it out.§r
chat.577ad8554f22d2f95179709509620958978: §7[1/6] §r§2Tasim: §r§aWait, stop! Don't want you falling off the edge.§r
chat.8d0b710496ccaad4a07f6097fbcdc9101b9: §7[2/6] §r§2Tasim: §r§aYeah, there's no way we'll get across here, unless one of you happened to be a bridge repairman back in Fruma.§r
chat.7f93cd4904d0547a973f4e73bb4f6082418: §7[3/6] §r§2Aledar: §r§aCome to think of it, I don't remember. I know this sounds crazy, but I honestly can't remember anything I did back home.§r
chat.8986eea7680be3923dd949ad9cca56a10d2: §7[4/6] §r§2Tasim: §r§aNo, you're not crazy, it's the same for me. It looks like %s is suffering the same amnesia, as well.§r
^§7\[4/6\] §r§2Tasim: §r§aNo, you're not crazy, it's the same for me\. It looks like (\w+) is suffering the same amnesia, as well\.§r$
chat.eabb49b540d2c91a29df5d5dd4813c2c0c8: §7[5/6] §r§2Aledar: §r§aIt's a mystery for another day, I suppose.§r
chat.8ea14e008197a0747b20be67fa73c49ea77: §7[6/6] §r§2Aledar: §r§aFor now, %s, let's look for a way across. There's gotta be something we can use to get to the other side...§r
^§7\[6/6\] §r§2Aledar: §r§aFor now, (\w+), let's look for a way across\. There's gotta be something we can use to get to the other side\.\.\.§r$
chat.ff96fb251d488b20a4aa89da524fa4aafb5: §7[1/1] §r§2Tasim: §r§aI guess that's §r§a§oone§r§a way of getting across! You guys head over the ravine, I'll be right behind you.§r
chat.fddb0858c64aa4ad03a8f4a25eae1a8d01d: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§aJust ahead is the entrance to the underpass. Once we get through there, we'll be at the castle!§r
chat.32fb65eca5609144ff0fa663a2811da1b25: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§aWhat are you doing? Don't go wandering off!§r
chat.8113fa200bfc8757135ba3ac1ac89ef9b23: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§aWe can use this tree as a bridge to get across to the other side.§r
chat.a51a1cffe3790abe6513aaad42193de9ee4: §7[1/5] §r§2Guard: §r§aAh, the new recruits. I'm afraid you won't be able to pass through here yet.§r
chat.5064df4441a5c44c99601eb3f683143d32a: §7[3/5] §r§2Guard: §r§aSomehow a bunch of corrupt sieged the underpass. It's not safe to go in unarmed. You three need weapons first.§r
chat.c86c55f941a5ef9f24470fa5a3c9222af25: §7[4/5] §r§2Guard: §r§aYou should be able to use the nearby resources to craft your own.§r
chat.7a31fb641025ab4d8f85b3db02bfa0314c1: §7[5/5] §r§2Aledar: §r§aFine. I know what to do. %s, Tasim, follow me.§r
^§7\[5/5\] §r§2Aledar: §r§aFine\. I know what to do\. (\w+), Tasim, follow me\.§r$
chat.1424b0ae3f4b6cb5bfaaae933361f4f1cda: §7[1/2] §r§2Aledar: §r§aThis is the refinery the old man was talking about.§r
chat.177c9fe9cb2bf7cd452919dbcef1e6a42b1: §7[2/2] §r§2Aledar: §r§aUse it to make §r§3[2 String]§r§a and then show it to me. There's some wheat nearby if you need any more.§r
chat.55716d0b4ef3904d1582af9440170c65af9: §7[1/3] §r§2Aledar: §r§aGood job! But that was only the first step. Now, on to step two. Follow me.§r
chat.17098f245cebb41c22f75cd2b38f8cadaab: §7[1/3] §r§2Aledar: §r§aOkay, you've refined the string. Follow me for the next step in the crafting process.§r
chat.d50b57651608d782bdb73093f118b1206a6: §7[2/3] §r§2Aledar: §r§aNow we've got to refine some logs into wood. Cut down the nearby trees if you need more logs.§r
chat.d39c6f99e579f9c82665a27069a88c22213: §7[3/3] §r§2Aledar: §r§aRefine the logs into §r§3[2 Wood]§r§a and then show them to me.§r
chat.aa6a8f8d5c34311ec63c506a07c4b03918b: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§bLeft-click§r§a on the refinery, then follow the instructions to make §r§3[2 Wood]§r§a for your weapon.§r
chat.ae33aa44a3ba180449ee66460145f1f4513: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§aShow your weapon to the guard so he'll let us through.§r
chat.7f8b0283f194bd0c46fed82ea0ef3683886: §7[1/1] §r§2Guard: §r§aLooks like you are all in order, I hope you know how to use it. You may pass, but be careful, it's still very dangerous.§r
chat.3902cf64ab92aca7b757c9bff1558838183: §7[2/3] §r§2Tasim: §r§aThat must be one of those "Corrupted" the old man mentioned. Don't worry, it's moving so slow that it can't hurt us.§r
chat.6f3dfdfdca5c091404ab3fc76f0a7ea341e: §7[2/2] §r§2Aledar: §r§a%s, take the one in the front. We'll get the two in the back!§r
^§7\[2/2\] §r§2Aledar: §r§a(\w+), take the one in the front\. We'll get the two in the back!§r$
chat.4fdfc7d2038f30142ad35395e1971caca99: §7[1/1] §r§2Tasim: §r§aGreat work, %s! We're almost to the castle, so let's keep going!§r
^§7\[1/1\] §r§2Tasim: §r§aGreat work, (\w+)! We're almost to the castle, so let's keep going!§r$
chat.d3e8f420c13c9256c02e637b921d2256d84: §7[1/8] §r§2Guard: §r§aFinally, some backup! Help me out here, would ya?§r
chat.16b6f817de7726765f0c239942e25f15f94: §7[2/8] §r§2Aledar: §r§aWhat's happened, did you get attacked by the corrupt?§r
chat.aaf3bf4b88005f558b1d21384cc74dbb246: §7[3/8] §r§2Guard: §r§aNot quite, recruit. I'm well-equipped for them. The issue is this cave-in.§r
chat.9e683adb2563f6ed0f5484a8a6d628b6a87: §7[4/8] §r§2Tasim: §r§aThis isn't seriously the only way through, is it? What are we going to do?§r
chat.85d267c0413a1d50ca5f256f0ed4ef5299e: §7[5/8] §r§2Guard: §r§aIf it wasn't for my injuries, I could just use my weapon to cast a §r§bspell§r§a on these boulders to get rid of them.§r
chat.bdd26fe50ee8115561a5aa286a04a58abf3: §7[6/8] §r§2Guard: §r§aI know you're new, but we're out of options.§r
chat.4d8a8a025ec90bbd3893835635ae2620880: §7[7/8] §r§2Guard: §r§a%s, you're an Archer, right? Walk up to the boulder for me.§r
^§7\[7/8\] §r§2Guard: §r§a(\w+), you're an Archer, right\? Walk up to the boulder for me\.§r$
chat.8dc17006a15564de1140d6e1f7fae40e6ff: §7[8/8] §r§2Guard: §r§aNow, cast your Arrow Storm spell by clicking §r§bLeft-Right-Left§r§a!§r
chat.24b8e368f830ba73b3010ffdced348fcde1: §7[1/1] §r§2Tasim: §r§aHey, where are you going? We need you to use your spell on that boulder!§r
chat.57155c23626925cb51f398dc1c5d8b9a4b7: §7[1/1] §r§2Guard: §r§aGet in front of the boulder and cast your spell by clicking §r§bLeft-Right-Left§r§a!§r
chat.4b783610f728d68fa425246cdf3b3f5b33c: §7[1/1] §r§2Guard: §r§aGood work. Now, you three head on towards the castle.§r
chat.bc921696baa1aa01d9237ff0f6a0ab678e5: §7[3/3] §r§2Soldier: §r§aWell, I'm just glad everyone made it out okay. All right, recruits, the castle is straight ahead!§r
chat.1ec0f0567300685f1dc3e21ee96659880cb: §7[1/1] §r§2Guard: §r§aHey, you guys, the castle's this way!§r
chat.d286f9c915279fe0f072707e3409c519e5b: §7[1/3] §r§2Aledar: §r§aOkay, only one more step to go. Let's make this quick so we can get to the castle in time.§r
chat.2c30d2e63c8ca861c79cb3843a982a3ae94: §7[2/3] §r§2Aledar: §r§aThe last thing we need to do is use this workbench to forge your weapon.§r
chat.4753eca1e2346a7c51a5d0b12df12ea4caa: §7[3/3] §r§2Aledar: §r§aUse §r§b2 string§r§a and §r§b1 wood§r§a to craft §r§3[1 Bow]§r§a and then show it to the guard.§r
chat.c063a1b0bd33ee4f61dd4d9c9e63c97bd5e: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§aUse §r§b2 string§r§a and §r§b1 wood§r§a at the workbench to create §r§3[1 Bow]§r§a and then show it to me.§r
chat.8a14ab4d0f0fc1c4e6ee9d636a20f05c203: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§aIt's not the strongest weapon, but it's enough. Let's go and see if this is good enough for the guard, '.§r
chat.f8451eecb626106cc65f1d285777b7790da: §7[1/1] §r§2Aledar: §r§aWell, we made it. Guess we better head inside and talk to the King.§r
chat.63bf7a57107563fe1f633f9a1a56d576878: §4You must talk to the King first. Right-click on him to start a conversation.§r
chat.9f426f9aa1100b233205e62cc746f103bfe: §7[1/1] §r§2Ragni's King: §r§aAh, you must be the last recruit. Please come over here and speak to me.§r
chat.fa21af5f846c7e3fb468c7d246106478329: §7[1/7] §r§2Ragni's King: §r§aHello! Your friends just left. They told me quite the story about what happened to you three on the way here.§r
chat.3faf564db6f4f52a361080794879a76d624: §7[3/7] §r§2Ragni's King: §r§aThis is the noble fort of Ragni, one of the oldest and most influential cities in the province!§r
chat.b03caef615564a8a5c6753cfb1918fb3154: §7[4/7] §r§2Ragni's King: §r§aYour job as a soldier of Wynn is to stop the growth of the monsters that are ravaging the province.§r
chat.1649445ad866d5f6f4589c4a7854f3ffdb6: §7[5/7] §r§2Ragni's King: §r§aYou might want to train a little more before hand, though. Many lives are lost everyday...§r
chat.3312dee1fcea11044f3b7add66b7a5bd2ed: §7[6/7] §r§2Ragni's King: §r§a... Anyway, good luck! If you are lost, use §r§3map.wynncraft.com§r§3 §r§aas it is very useful if you don't know where to go.§r
chat.84c591a7223f0b61c80fe637711e11bc1ee: §7[7/7] §r§2Ragni's King: §r§aTake this §r§3[1 Ragni Teleportation Scroll]§r§a too! It will bring you back here if you use it.§r
chat.6a627b885b5afde29da671d5434060c13d1: §7+2 Skill Points §r§8[Open the character menu to use them]§r
chat.6226489ce205caa89fc8927d05c86eef4dc: §d            - §r§7+ Access to the Province of Wynn§r
chat.e99415326321afe67a93b6370ec99d3b0cf: §7[1/1] §r§2Ragni's King: §r§aOff you go, I've said everything I have to say.§r
